subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Probably a {{der|yue|qfa-tak}} substrate. Compare {{cog|za|maq||to carry on the back}}, {{cog|giu|ma⁵||to carry on the back}}, {{cog|mmd|ʔma⁵||to carry on the back}}. Cognate with Fuzhou {{cog|cdo|邁|tr=mâi||to carry on the back}}.
